WorkItem.ClosedComment: While still not yet perfect in its handling of the # character in number format masks, handling for this specific instance has already been fixed in the develop branch on github.
WorkItem.Description:
Hi All, 

I just downloaded PHPExcel 1.7.8 and tried to use it to read data from the attached excel file.
In the file, the whole column B is formatted as "0######"
It is supposed to read 0225614 when using getFormattedValue() method. However, it only reads 225614.

Am i using the wrong method? How can i get the custom-formatted value correctly?

Thanks in advance!
